00010 #pragma once
00011 #include "FeatureCycles.h"
00012 #include "Addons.h"
00013 #include "StepNCTooling.h"
00014 
00015 /*
00016 cutting_depth - The depth of the cut of this operation, which may differ from the depth of the hole as
00017 such. The NC controller will not check if cutting_depth violates the boundaries of
00018 the associated hole feature. If omitted, the total depth of the feature will be drilled.*/
00019 
00020 
00021 class StepNCCenterDrilling : public   IWorkCycle
00022 {
00023 public:
00024   StepNCCenterDrilling(IWorkCycles * owner=NULL) ;
00025   virtual ~StepNCCenterDrilling(){}
00026   virtual HRESULT DeriveParameters(IStepNodePtr pExecutable, IStepNodePtr pFeature, IStepNodePtr pOpItem);
00027   virtual HRESULT LoadIntoStep();
00028   virtual HRESULT Create(IStepNodePtr);
00029   virtual void InitValues(CCannedCycleItems *pItems){}
00030   BEGIN_STEP_MAP(StepNCCenterDrilling)
00031 
00032     // These build up the tree - these must be in the proper order
00033     ENTRY(_T("Feature"),    Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname,   _T("its_feature"))   
00034     ENTRY(_T("Operation"),    Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname,   _T("its_operation"))
00035     ENTRY(_T("SecurityPlane"),  Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::StepPosition,  _T("its_secplane/position"))
00036     ENTRY(_T("FeaturePlacement"),Cycle::Executable, Cycle::StepPosition,  _T("its_feature/feature_placement"))
00037     ENTRY(_T("Depth"),      Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::StepPosition,  _T("its_feature/depth/position"))
00038     
00039     // diameter/implicit_tolerance/  :: PLUS_MINUS_VALUE(0.100,0.100,3)
00040 
00041     ENTRY(_T("FeatureName"),  Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::String,    _T("its_id"))
00042     ENTRY(_T("ReferencePlane"), Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[2]"))
00043     ENTRY(_T("RetractPlane"), Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Position,  _T("retract_plane"))
00044     ENTRY(_T("SafetyPlane"),  Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Position,  _T("its_secplane/position/location/coordinates[2]"))
00045 
00046     ENTRY(_T("CenterX"),    Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[0]"))
00047     ENTRY(_T("CenterY"),    Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("feature_placement/location/coordinates[1]"))
00048     ENTRY(_T("AbsDepth"),   Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Position,  _T("depth/position/location/coordinates[2]"))
00049     ENTRY(_T("Diameter"),   Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::Double,    _T("diameter/theoretical_size"))
00050 
00051     // dwell type issues...
00052     ENTRY(_T("DoDwell"),    Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Boolean,   _T("spindle_stop_at_bottom"))  
00053     ENTRY(_T("Dwell"),      Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Double,    _T("dwell_time_bottom"))  
00054 
00055 
00056     ENTRY(_T("CycleType"),    Cycle::Compute,   Cycle::Long,    _T("CycleType = 1.0 + Find(Operation, \"finish\")"))
00057 
00058     ENTRY(_T("StepFeedrate"), Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Feed,    _T("its_technology/feedrate"))
00059     ENTRY(_T("Feedrate"),   Cycle::Compute,   Cycle::Feed,    _T("Feedrate = StepFeedrate * 1000.0 * 60.0 ;"))
00060     ENTRY(_T("RetractionFeedrate"),Cycle::Compute,  Cycle::Feed,    _T("Feedrate = StepFeedrate * 1000.0  * 60.0 ;"))
00061     
00062     ENTRY(_T("StepSpeed"),    Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Speed,     _T("its_technology/spindle"))
00063     ENTRY(_T("Speed"),      Cycle::Compute,   Cycle::Speed,   _T("Speed = fabs(SpindleSpeed);"))
00064     ENTRY(_T("SpindleDir"),   Cycle::Compute,   Cycle::Long,    _T("SpindleDir=( 3.0 + (SpindleSpeed>=0));")) 
00065 
00066     ENTRY(_T("Overcut"),    Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("overcut_length"))
00067     ENTRY(_T("CuttingDepth"), Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("cutting_depth"))
00068 
00069     LINK(StepNCTooling)
00070 
00071   END_STEP_MAP(StepNCCenterDrilling)
00072 
00073   BEGIN_VERIFY_PARAMETER_MAP(StepNCCenterDrilling)
00074     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("CutterComp != \"TCP\"") , _T(""))
00075     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Dwell < 0.0") , _T("DWELL_TIME_MUST_NOT_BE_NEGATIVE"))
00076     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("RetractPlane <= ReferencePlane") , _T(""))
00077     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("ReferencePlane <= AbsDepth") ,  _T(""))
00078     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Feedrate <= 0.0") ,  _T(""))
00079     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Speed <= 0.0") ,  _T(""))
00080     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Toollength < (ReferencePlane - AbsDepth)") ,  _T(""))
00081     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("Overcut != 0.0") ,  _T("CENTER_DRILLING_MUST_NOT_HAVE_OVERCUT_LENGTH"))
00082     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("CuttingDepth < 0.0") ,  _T("CUTTING_DEPTH_MUST_BE_POSITIVE"))
00083     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("CuttingDepth > ( fabs(AbsDepth - ReferencePlane)") ,  _T("CUTTING_DEPTH_MUST_NOT_BE_GREATER_THAN_DEPTH"))
00084     STEPNC_VERIFY_ENTRY(_T("Error"), _T("Both"), _T("RetractionFeedrate<=0.0") ,  _T("FEED_ON_RETRACE_MUST_NOT_BE_NEGATIVE_OR_TINY"))
00085     
00086   END_VERIFY_PARAMETER_MAP(StepNCCenterDrilling)
00087   IStepNodePtr _project;
00088 };
00089 FEATURE_DECLARE_SMARTPOINTER(StepNCCenterDrilling);
00090 
00091 inline StepNCCenterDrilling::StepNCCenterDrilling(IWorkCycles * owner) :   IWorkCycle(owner)
00092 { 
00093   _parent=owner;
00094   InitStepItems(&items);
00095   InitTests(this);
00096 
00097 }
00098 inline HRESULT StepNCCenterDrilling::DeriveParameters(IStepNodePtr pExecutable, IStepNodePtr pFeature, IStepNodePtr pOpItem)
00099 {
00100   IWorkCycle::DeriveParameters(pExecutable, pFeature, pOpItem);
00101   CCannedCycleItems * items = GetStepMap();  // initialize output for now...  
00102 
00103   items->SetVariable(_T("CycleType"),  1) ;
00104 
00105   items->SetVariable(_T("Feedrate"), items->GetValue<double>(_T("StepFeedrate")) * 1000.0 * 60.0) ;
00106   items->SetVariable(_T("RetractionFeedrate"), items->GetValue<double>(_T("StepFeedrate")) * 1000.0 * 60.0) ;
00107   items->SetVariable(_T("SafetyPlane"), 2.0) ;
00108   items->SetVariable(_T("Speed"), fabs(items->GetValue<double>(_T("StepSpeed")))) ;
00109   items->SetVariable(_T("SpindleDir"), 3.0 + (items->GetValue<double>(_T("StepSpeed"))>=0)) ;
00110 
00111   // if tooling is wrong revise items list before calling this.
00112   //_toolnum= DeriveToolParameters( pFeature,  pOpItem);
00113 
00114 
00115   SanityCheck() ;
00116   debugstream << GetStepMap()->ToString();
00117   return S_OK;
00118 }
00119 
00120 inline HRESULT StepNCCenterDrilling::Create(IStepNodePtr project)
00121 {
00122   if(project==NULL)
00123     return E_INVALIDARG;
00124   CAddons addon(project);
00125 
00126   //if(project->main_workplan==NULL)
00127   //  project->AddAttribute(StrFormat(_T("/main_workplan")));
00128   //_pExecutable = (Eexecutable *) new Emachining_workingstep(); 
00129   project->AddAttribute(bstrFormat(bstr_t(L"/main_workplan/its_elements[-1]{machining_workingstep}")));
00130   INodeListPtr list = project->SelectNodeList(_T("/main_workplan/its_elements"));
00131   _pExecutable= project->SelectNode(bstrFormat(_T("/main_workplan/its_elements[%d]"), list->size()-1));
00132 
00133   items.ClearDirtyFlags(); 
00134 
00135   return S_OK;
00136 }
00137 
00138 inline HRESULT StepNCCenterDrilling::LoadIntoStep() 
00139 { 
00140   CAddons addons(gProject);
00141   StepNCTooling tooling;
00142   tooling.DeriveParameters(&items, _pExecutable); 
00143   IWorkCycle::LoadWSIntoStep(gProject);
00144   addons.DefineStepNcImplicitTolerance(_pFeature, _T("diameter/implicit_tolerance"), _T("0.3"), _T("0.3"), _T("3"));
00145   return S_OK; 
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00149 
00150 
00151 class StepNCReaming : public   StepNCCenterDrilling
00152 {
00153 public:
00154   StepNCReaming(IWorkCycles * owner=NULL)  :  StepNCCenterDrilling(owner)
00155   {
00156     _parent=owner;
00157     InitStepItems(&items);
00158     CCannedCycleItems * items = GetStepMap();  // initialize output for now...  
00159     items->SetVariable(_T("Type"), _T("Reaming")) ;
00160 
00161   }
00162   virtual ~StepNCReaming(){}
00163 };
